statements: SELECT * FROM feature_adoption;
SELECT user_id, adoption_date, feature_name FROM feature_adoption WHERE tier_level = 1;
SELECT feature_name, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption WHERE tier_level > 2 ORDER BY adoption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, feature_name FROM feature_adoption ORDER BY tier_level ASC, adoption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption WHERE tier_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, feature_name, tier_level FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id FROM feature_adoption WHERE feature_name LIKE '%premium%';
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption ORDER BY adoption_date DESC, tier_level ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feature_name) AS feature_count FROM feature_adoption GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(feature_name) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT adoption_date, feature_id FROM feature_adoption ORDER BY adoption_date DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(adoption_date) AS latest_adoption FROM feature_adoption GROUP BY user_id
SELECT tier_name, price_per_user FROM pricing_tiers WHERE min_users <= 10 AND max_users >= 50
SELECT AVG(price_per_user) AS average_price FROM pricing_tiers
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(price_per_user) AS max_price FROM pricing_tiers WHERE tier_name = 'Gold Tier';
SELECT user_id, tier_name FROM feature_adoption JOIN pricing_tiers ON feature_adoption.feature_id = pricing_tiers.tier_id;
SELECT feature_id, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT user_id, adoption_date, activity_count FROM feature_adoption;
SELECT feature_id, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption ORDER BY adoption_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tier_id, tier_name FROM feature_tiers;
SELECT user_id, feature_id, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption WHERE activity_count > 10;
SELECT pricing_id, tier_id, monthly_price, annual_discount FROM pricing_structures WHERE monthly_price < 1000;
SELECT user_id, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption WHERE activity_count > 10 ORDER BY adoption_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feature_id, COUNT(*) AS total_adoption FROM feature_adoption GROUP BY feature_id HAVING total_adoption > 1 ORDER BY total_adoption DESC;
SELECT tier_name, max_features, max_users FROM feature_tiers WHERE max_features >= 5 AND max_users < 100 ORDER BY tier_name;
SELECT pricing_id, monthly_price, annual_discount FROM pricing_structures WHERE monthly_price < 50 AND annual_discount >= 0.1 ORDER BY annual_discount DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT user_id, adoption_date, activity_count, tier_name, monthly_price FROM feature_adoption fa JOIN feature_tiers ft ON fa.user_id = ft.tier_id JOIN pricing_structures ps ON fa.user_id = ps.tier_id ORDER BY adoption_date ASC, monthly_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption;
SELECT customer_id, feature_name, adoption_status FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_status = TRUE;
SELECT feature_name, adoption_status FROM feature_adoption ORDER BY feature_name ASC;
SELECT segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, feature_name, adoption_date FROM adoption_history ORDER BY adoption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, feature_name FROM feature_adoption WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT segment_name, count(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_segments JOIN feature_adoption ON customer_segments.segment_id = feature_adoption.customer_id GROUP BY segment_name;
SELECT feature_name, adoption_date FROM adoption_history WHERE adoption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT tier_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_tiers JOIN feature_adoption ON pricing_tiers.tier_id = feature_adoption.customer_id GROUP BY tier_name ORDER BY avg_price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM feature_adoption;
SELECT user_id, feature_name, adoption_status FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_status = 'adopted';
SELECT user_id, adoption_date FROM feature_adoption ORDER BY adoption_date DESC;
SELECT tier_name, monthly_price FROM product_tiers WHERE max_features > 5;
SELECT user_id, feature_name, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'click' ORDER BY activity_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, feature_name, adoption_status FROM feature_adoption WHERE adoption_status = 'adopted';
SELECT tier_name, monthly_price FROM product_tiers WHERE monthly_price > 50.00 ORDER BY tier_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, feature_name, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'upgrade' AND user_id = 1001 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT tier_name, max_features FROM product_tiers WHERE max_features >= 5 AND max_features <= 10 ORDER BY max_features ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM data_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
